content: canary pattern finished size 13 cm/ 5 in yarn information note you can use any stashed 4-ply or dk yellow yarn this pattern the yarn listed here is what i used yarn a drops flora 4-ply 65% wool 35% alpaca 50g/210m yarn b drops kid-silk mohair 75% mohair 25% silk 25g/210m yarn a drops alpaca 4-ply 100% alpaca 50g/167m *1 ball of yarn a yellow 17 *1 ball of yarn b vanilla 29 *1 ball of yarn c blush 9026 note *you ll only require a very small amount of yarn not the whole ball video there is a how-to video for how to embroider both the eyes and the beak here https //www instagram com/p/crbtl9eit_s/ utm_source=ig_web_copy_link and https //www instagram com/p/crln9g4ovvk/ utm_source=ig_web_copy_link stockist info drops design www garnstudio com woolwarehouse www woolwarehouse co uk needles & accessories a pair of 4mm knitting needles embroidery thread or dk yarn in black for eyes toy filling 2 stitch markers gauge yarn ab knits as dk to this gauge 24 sts and 32 row to measure 10x10cm 4x4in over stocking stitch using 4mm needles pattern tail body & head are worked as one piece tail beg at tail tip with yarn ab two strands colour held together cast on 3 sts row 1 ws purl row 2 rs k1 kfb k1 4 sts row 3 5 7 & 9 purl row 4 increase rs kfb k1 m1 k1 kfb 7 sts row 6 increase rs k3 kfb k3 8 sts row 8 increase rs kfb k3 m1 k3 kfb 11sts row 10 increase rs k5 kfb k5 12 sts row 11-13 beg with a purl row st st 3 row row 14 decrease rs k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog 10 sts row 15-17 beg with a purl row st st 3 row body row 18 increase rs kfb k to last st kfb 12 sts row 19 increase ws p1 pfb purl to last 2 sts pfb p1 14 sts row 20-23 repeat last 2 row twice 22 sts pm at each end of last row to mark body row 24 increase rs kfb k to last st kfb 24 sts row 25-35 beg with a purl row st st 11 row row 36 rs k2tog k8 kfb k2 kfb knit to last 2 sts k2tog row 37 increase ws pfb purl to last st pfb 26 sts head row 38 rs k20 w&t row 39 ws p14 w&t row 40 rs k13 w&t row 41 ws p12 w&t row 42 rs k11 w&t row 43 ws p10 w&t row 44 rs k9 w&t row 45 ws p8 w&t row 46 rs k7 w&t row 47 ws p6 w&t row 48 rs k5 w&t row 49 ws p4 w&t row 50 rs k15 to end of row row 51 decrease ws *p2tog p2 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2tog 19 sts cut yarn leaving a long tail end thread end through all 19 sts for beak point pull
